entry: That was too much. Keep that dog away from me. !bored
I'm no match for this kind of special companionship.
And now I'm in serious risk of dying… !sad
But I have learned my lesson.
I won't try to destroy the world anymore. This goal really isn't worth being put out like that. !bored
It will take a while getting the stench off of me… !bored
Goodbye. Maybe see you in a sequel. !endgameB !end
